const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    term: {
      product: "chocolate",
    },
  },
  sort: [
    {
      "offer.price": {
        mode: "avg",
        order: "asc",
        nested: {
          path: "offer",
          filter: {
            term: {
              "offer.color": "blue",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response);
